data.actual_result: It is black and also the search background is black, so you can barely see it.
data.expected_result: The "x" icon to remove search input should be in white color like the other "x" icons.
data.short_description: [iPhone, iPod only] Black icon for removing search input on black search background
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your "Direct Messages" - Click on the search for users and groups there - Type something - Observe the icon to remove search input
